title: Scroll Box (Fubako) with Miscellaneous Crest Design
dimensions: overall, closed: H. 7.5 x W. 24.5 x D. 8.1 cm (2 15/16 x 9 5/8 x 3 3/16 in.)
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, The Elaine Ehrenkranz Collection of Japanese Lacquer Boxes; Gift of Elaine Ehrenkranz
medium: Lacquer on wood with decoration in gold utilizing the hiramaki-e (low-relief sprinkled design), takamaki-e (high-relief sprinkled design), nashiji ("pear-skinned" ground), and kanagai (sheet-gold appliqu√©) techniques; metal fittings and silk cord
